headline: L3Harris Red Wolf Award Deepens Role In Long Range Precision Strike
summary: L3Harris Technologies (NYSE:LHX) has been selected by the U.S. Naval Air Systems Command to supply advanced Red Wolf precision strike vehicles. The award covers development, testing, and manufacturing under the Precision Attack Strike Munition program in support of U.S. Marine Corps missions. Red Wolf systems are designed for long range precision strike with autonomous, beyond line of sight engagement capabilities. L3Harris Technologies, traded on the NYSE under ticker LHX, focuses on...
